required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Accuracy of 3D Printed Complete Dentures Using Two Impression Techniques: RCT
clinical_study.official_title: Retention of 3D Printed Bases Using Prefabricated Thermoplastic Trays and Conventional Custom Impression Trays: Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
the aim of this crossover randomized controlled clinical trial is comparing retention of 3D printed maxillary complete dentures produced from thermoplastic impression trays and conventional acrylic impression trays.
The research hypothesis is that there is no difference in patient satisfaction and retention of dentures constructed from definitive impression using the conventional tray and the prefabricated thermoplastic tray

primary_outcome.description: A loop will be attached to each denture base at the position of geographic center using self cure acrylic resin and the retention will be measured by applying the forces perpendicular to the denture using Digital Force Meter Each base will be tested 3 times and the average will be calculated.

secondary_outcome.description: patient satisfaction data will be collected through questionnaire and graded by Visual analogue scale for both study arms

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male edentulous patients.
- Cooperative and highly motivated patients.
- Patients with well or moderately developed ridges and healthy attached mucosa of appropriate thickness free from inflammation
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with recent extraction less than 3 months ago
- Patients with Parkinson's disease
- Patients with xerostomia.
- Patients with allergy to resins.
- Pathological changes of residual ridges.
- Patient with sever undercuts, or irregular bony exostosis.
- Patients with flabby and flat ridges.
- Patients with medical or psychological conditions that hinder co-operation.
- Patients with class II or III jaw relation.

clinical_study.keyword: digital dentures, definitive impression, thermoplastic trays, printed denture, 3D, rapid prototyping
